overview: Welcome to the D-Cup Deli, where mounds of mouthwatering mammaries make the menu a breast lovers delight! Our special today: A double dosage of gourmet gazongas guaranteed to get your balls boiling! Fleshy plump melons bounce wildly and cradle stiff salamis, while wads of creamy cum drench and splatter huge soft cones. We stack them tall and pile them high, until these juicy jugulars burst out of their bras and melt in your mouth.
title: Double Decker Sandwich 2
